enum-type.name: rfcd-type
enum-type.documentation: Research Fields, Courses and Disciplines (RFCD) Codes

category.label: MATHEMATICS
category.value: Mathematical Logic, Set Theory, Lattices and Combinatorics
Category Theory, K Theory, Homological Algebra
Group Theory and Generalisations (incl. Topological Groups and Lie Groups)
Calculus of Variations and Control Theory

category.label: THEORETICAL AND CONDENSED MATTER PHYSICS
category.value: Condensed Matter Physics - Electronic and Magnetic Properties; Superconductivity

category.label: ATOMIC AND MOLECULAR PHYSICS; NUCLEAR AND PARTICLE PHYSICS; PLASMA PHYSICS

category.label: BIOCHEMISTRY AND CELL BIOLOGY
